name: Car Escape Puzzle
description:
Car Escape is a kind of super addictive puzzle game. You should try to open up your mind and find a way to get out the red car from the board, other cars can be moved vertically or horizontally. The exit will always be changing, so you really need to focus your minds on every single puzzle.


FEATURES

• Challenging to Find the Best Solution
- You can easily move all the cars on the board, but don't forget your goal is to escape the red car from the exit. It will be quite challenging to find the way, especially for harder levels.

• Be the Master of Escape from a Novice
- There are 5 stages for you to become the Master of "Escape" from a Novice. Even if you've never played this kind of "unblock" or "escape" puzzle, you can quickly handle it.

• Hundreds of Levels for You
- There are over hundreds of different levels which can lead you from the Novice to the Master stages. And more levels will be added in later versions.

• Daily Rewards Increasing Everyday
- Open the game and collect daily rewards every day. Besides the increasing coins, there will be a big reward package for your 7-days' activities.


HOW TO PLAY
• Horizontal cars can be moved from side to side
• Vertical cars can be moved up and down
• Move the red car to the exit


CONTACT
